original_text: The kings of every nation in the world wanted to talk to Solomon. They wanted to listen to the wisdom that God had given to him.
korean_text: 천하의 열왕이 하나님께서 솔로몬의 마음에 주신 지혜를 들으며 그의 얼굴을 보기 원하여

sentences.original_text: The kings of every nation in the world
They wanted to listen to the wisdom
that God had given to him
